comments.body: I think this is missing `RWST` instances.

I don't think we can have `RWST` instances for the same reason we can't have `Kleisli` and `StateT` instances. It would require us to run the inner functions. I can't think of a way to go from e.g. `Kleisli[SyncIO, A, B]` to `SyncIO[B]` without an `A`.
